content:
TITLE: Import and Use SyntaxHighlighter with Prism
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to import and use the SyntaxHighlighter component with Prism.js for syntax highlighting. It imports the Prism version of SyntaxHighlighter and a dark style, defines a React component, and renders a JavaScript code string with the specified language and style.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import { Prism as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import { dark } from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism';
const Component = () => {
  const codeString = '(num) => num + 1';
  return (
    <SyntaxHighlighter language="javascript" style={dark}>
      {codeString}
    </SyntaxHighlighter>
  );
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Import and Use SyntaxHighlighter with HLJS
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to import and use the SyntaxHighlighter component with the HLJS (Highlight.js) style. It imports the SyntaxHighlighter and a specific style (docco), defines a simple React component, and uses SyntaxHighlighter to render a JavaScript code string with the specified language and style.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import SyntaxHighlighter from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import { docco } from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/hljs';
const Component = () => {
  const codeString = '(num) => num + 1';
  return (
    <SyntaxHighlighter language="javascript" style={docco}>
      {codeString}
    </SyntaxHighlighter>
  );
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Import and Use Prism Light Build
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to import and use the Prism light build of SyntaxHighlighter. It imports the PrismLight version of SyntaxHighlighter, a specific language (jsx), and a style (prism). It then registers the language with SyntaxHighlighter for use in highlighting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: JSX
CODE:
```
import { PrismLight as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import jsx from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/languages/prism/jsx';
import prism from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism/prism';

SyntaxHighlighter.registerLanguage('jsx', jsx);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Import and Use Light Build with HLJS
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to import and use the light build of SyntaxHighlighter with HLJS. It imports the Light version of SyntaxHighlighter, a specific language (javascript), and a style (docco). It then registers the language with SyntaxHighlighter for use in highlighting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import { Light as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import js from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/languages/hljs/javascript';
import docco from 'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/hljs/docco';

SyntaxHighlighter.registerLanguage('javascript', js);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Import Async Prism Light
DESCRIPTION: This code shows how to import the asynchronous version of Prism Light. This version defers loading of refractor and languages, improving initial load time. It requires a bundler that supports dynamic imports.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import { PrismAsyncLight as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Import Async Highlight Light
DESCRIPTION: This code shows how to import the asynchronous version of Highlight.js Light.  This version defers loading of refractor and languages, improving initial load time. It requires a bundler that supports dynamic imports.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import { LightAsync as SyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Register a New Language (cURL with HLJS)
DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to register a new language (cURL in this case) with the light build of SyntaxHighlighter. It imports the light build and the language definition, then registers the language using `registerLanguage`.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import { Light as LightSyntaxHighlighter } from 'react-syntax-highlighter';
import curl from 'highlightjs-curl';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Register the New Language (cURL with HLJS)
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows the final step in adding support for a new language: registering the language with the highlighter instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
LightSyntaxHighlighter.registerLanguage('curl', curl);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Access Supported Languages
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to access the `supportedLanguages` static field of the SyntaxHighlighter component. This field provides a list of languages supported by the highlighter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
SyntaxHighlighter.supportedLanguages;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Start the development server using npm
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the development server, which allows for live editing and testing of the react-syntax-highlighter package. It's typically used during development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Install dependencies using npm
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the dependencies required for building the react-syntax-highlighter package. It's a necessary step before running the development server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/react-syntax-highlighter/react-syntax-highlighter/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i
```
